entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi v9.0.0-preview.6.24328.4 is generating schemas for primitive types #56735
  • Hard to debug role-based authorization failures #56734
  • ServerAuthenticationStateProvider.SetAuthenticationState() throws an exception #56733
  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback #56732
  • BuildServiceProviderAnalyzer: Detect BuildServiceProvider Calls in Extension Methods for IServiceCollection #56731
  • Fixes to generated schemas for some primitive types #56730
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #56729
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56728
  • Regression: HTTP 401 using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.7 #56727
  • Update PackageOverrides.txt for latest packages #56724
  • [Component Vulnerability]please consider to upgrade ws in @microsoft/signalr from @^7.4.5 to @^7.5.10 #56723
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ModelBinding.QueryStringValueProviderFactory.CreateValueProviderAsync #56722
  • Signing during test project builds #56721
  • Perf regression: single_query #56718
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_spring, plaintext_spring #56717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, json_spring, json_spring #56716
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext_spring, plainTextEmptyFilter #56715
  • Returning TypedResult.Redirect become EmptyHttpResult #56714
  • OpenAPI Vs Swashbuckle #56711
  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #56710

Closed

  • .NET 9 OpenAPI doesn't seem to export schemas (e.g. types) #56586
  • Servers not emitted in OpenAPI document #56188
  • HybridCache.RemoveAsync calls RemoveByTagAsync instead of RemoveAsync #56581
  • Quarantine GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #39986
    Test failures
  • [Blazor Webapp] Handling browser close/reload in server and wasm mode #56683
  • PageTitle component added in BuildRenderTree do not update the "title". #56708
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56698
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #56697

PullRequests

Created

  • Update jquery.validate to 1.20.1 #56726
    area-mvc
  • [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56725
    area-mvc
  • Improve endpoint extension method docs #56713
    area-networking
  • Apply schema transformers on properties and other subschemas #56709
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Don't require AttributeProvider for JsonPropertyInfo-based modifications #56712
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Set OpenApiServers object in document #56470
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Revert "Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests (#55935)" #56615
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • [release/6.0] Bump to macos-12 build image #56273
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.33
  • Port "Lock around Http3Stream data frame processing" to `main` #56705
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • HybridCache - fix RemoveKeyAsync incorrectly calling RemoveByTagAsync #56719
    needs-area-label, 9.0-preview7
  • Add requirements comment to update-npm-dependencies #56670
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Renable GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #56720
    9.0-preview7
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • Look up trusted certs consistently on windows #56701
    area-commandlinetools
  • Port "Add direct references to S.T.J. in tools" to `main` #56704
    area-commandlinetools
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message & Helper Class #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56545
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • AddConnections: AddRouting -> AddRoutingCore #56703
    area-signalr
  • Remove LINQ usage from OpenAPI comparers #56599
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
